name: Titan of Industry
oracle_text:
Reach, trample
When Titan of Industry enters the battlefield, choose two —
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Target player gains 5 life.
• Create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.
• Put a shield counter on a creature you control.

oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

oracle_text:

Enchant opponent

oracle_text:
Enchant opponent

name: Threefold Signal
oracle_text:
When Threefold Signal enters the battlefield, scry 3.
Each spell you cast that's exactly three colors has replicate {3}. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies. A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

oracle_text:

name: Brokers Initiate
oracle_text: {4}{G/U}: Brokers Initiate has base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Regarding the relative might of pen and sword, the official position of the Brokers is "Why choose?"

Flash
Flying

name: Lagrella, the Magpie
oracle_text: When Lagrella, the Magpie enters the battlefield, exile any number of other target creatures controlled by different players until Lagrella leaves the battlefield. When an exiled card enters the battlefield under your control this way, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Most Wanted
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
When enchanted creature dies, create two Treasure tokens.
flavor_text: Overnight, Elspeth was branded the most dangerous criminal in New Capenna.

name: Lagrella, the Magpie
oracle_text: When Lagrella, the Magpie enters the battlefield, exile any number of other target creatures controlled by different players until Lagrella leaves the battlefield. When an exiled card enters the battlefield under your control this way, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Ominous Parcel
oracle_text:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Ominous Parcel: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Ominous Parcel: It deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: The rest of Anhelo's assistant arrived over the following week.

name: Backup Agent
oracle_text: When Backup Agent enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "My sources say the Beamtown Bullies were spotted in the Mezzzio. Keep your eyes sharp and stay close to me."

name: Gathering Throng
oracle_text: When Gathering Throng enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Gathering Throng, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: A plus-one is simply not enough.

name: Backstreet Bruiser
oracle_text:
Defender
As long as there are two or more counters among creatures you control, Backstreet Bruiser can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: "I could show you what's in the case, but it'd be the last thing you ever see."

name: Giada, Font of Hope
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
Each other Angel you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it for each Angel you already control.
{T}: Add {W}. Spend this mana only to cast an Angel spell.
flavor_text: The source of the Cabaretti's Halo turned out to be a single teenage girl.

name: Expendable Lackey
oracle_text: {1}{U}, Exile Expendable Lackey from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 blue Fish creature token with "This creature can't be blocked." Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text:
"Altonio, No, I'm sorry. No one by that name works here."
—Raffine

name: Kill Shot
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor_text:
"In the assassination trade, no one lives to make more than one mistake."
—Anhelo, the Painter

name: Revelation of Power
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it has a counter on it, it also gains flying and lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: As Ob Nixilis closed in, Halo swept through Giada like an electrical current, and inside her, something long dormant unfurled its wings.

name: Majestic Metamorphosis
oracle_text:
Until end of turn, target artifact or creature becomes a 4/4 Angel artifact creature and gains flying.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: New Capenna's statues hold Old Capenna's secrets.

name: Sewer Crocodile
oracle_text: {3}{U}: Sewer Crocodile can't be blocked this turn. This ability costs {3} less to activate if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Quick, let's hide in the sewer!"
—Ginsi the Thief, now deceased

name: Run Out of Town
oracle_text: The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
flavor_text: Better to depart in haste than be dearly departed.

name: Corrupt Court Official
oracle_text: When Corrupt Court Official enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"I wouldn't call what they have here a justice system. More like an auction."
—Elspeth

name: Antagonize
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The little guy had guts at least. You can see 'em right there between those cobbles."
—Glunk, freelance crusher

name: Daring Escape
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor_text: As the Adversary's forces descended upon the gala, Elspeth whispered to Giada, "I can get you out of here, but we have to go now."

name: Exhibition Magician
oracle_text:

oracle_text: Crooked Custodian enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: "Nothing to see here. Just carrying a carpet. Yes, the carpet wears boots. Stop asking questions."
